name: Jumping Pop
overview: Jumping Pop is a 2D arcade platform game, very similar to Nightmare in the Dark with colorful graphics. Player is a monster hunter with a special, powerful vacuum cleaner - he needs to catch enemies (mummies, skeletons, cavemen, etc.) He can use a captured enemy as a missile to kill other opponents. After killing all the enemies the player goes to the next level. At the end of each "world", the boss is waiting to fight..
